name: Super Robot Taisen EX
storyline: After the war against the Divine Crusaders (DC) in Super Robot Wars III, many robots and their pilots began to disappear. When Masaki Andoh returns to "Ragias Kingdom", his homeland. However, he is shocked to find that the main goverment from his kingdom was eradicated by terrorists.
summary: A remake of Super Robot Taisen EX released first in Super Robot Wars Complete Box. It was later released as a standalone title.
